long_description: meet jerid lydic, a graduate of our winter yoga teacher training. we are so grateful to have his calming presence, friendship & wit in our community. current mantra: make it different favorite pose: half/pigeon. love the depth of the stretch and the active ‘yet seemingly’ passive pose (lil yin and yang) least favorite pose: twisting triangle. always feels like an effort. maybe that means something ;-) what’s your favorite thing about hotbox. the community of students and teachers. love the connection and support across the group to learn and explore. what’s one thing you want to share with the hotbox community. i’ve been a passionate traveler/adventurer most of life. if you have a travel/adventure suggestion let me know. or a great travel story, i’m all ears. it’s one of the great connectors between us all i believe…travel as an access to discovery, connection and empathy. what are you most passionate about right now. reading and learning about expanded states of consciousness and how these may apply to healing as well as expanding & informing life perspective. when you aren’t at the studio where can we find you. hanging with my partner jess and our dog ziggy #meetourteam #phillyyogastudio #manayunk #philly #phillyyogateacher #teachertraining #community #practice #seeyouonyourmat
generated_description: hotbox is a yoga studio located in manayunk, philadelphia that offers yoga classes and teacher training. the studio is known for its community of students and teachers, providing a supportive environment for learning and exploration. jerid lydic, a graduate of their winter yoga teacher training program, is a notable member of the community and brings a calming presence, friendship, and wit to the studio. hotbox's current mantra is "make it different," and their favorite pose is the half/pigeon pose, with a focus on the depth of the stretch and the active 'yet seemingly' passive pose (lil yin and yang). their least favorite pose, the twisting triangle, always feels like an effort. the community of hotbox values travel as a means of discovery, connection, and empathy.
generated_business_tags: community building | teacher training programs | expansion and informing life perspective
